meanings.definition: A genius or highly intelligent person.
meanings.sent1: My friend is an einstein when it comes to solving math problems.
meanings.sent2: Albert Einstein was a famous einstein known for his groundbreaking theories.
meanings.sent3: The little boy thought he was an einstein after solving a simple puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her einstein-like ability to grasp complex concepts amazed everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: Being an einstein in the field of physics requires dedication and hard work.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for the amount of energy absorbed by one mole of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The chemist calculated the energy using the einstein unit.
meanings.sent2: The experiment measured the heat in einstein units.
meanings.sent3: The cake absorbed so much heat, it could be measured in einstein units!
meanings.sent4: The einstein unit helped quantify the energy transfer in the reaction.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the concept of einstein units is crucial in chemistry experiments.
